short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to add items to your Lists!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the Lolly List extension to instantly add any item from an online retailer to your list of choice.  When on a retail website on a particular item you want to keep track of, click on the extension and a window will pop up with the item descriptors, then you can simply pick which of your lists you are adding the item to and hit submit.  And voila, that item is now saved in your list!
